      • getKeyInventory

        public java.util.LinkedList<Key> getKeyInventory()
        Returns:
        the keyInventory

      • addSalesPerson

        public void addSalesPerson(SalesPerson inSalesPerson)
        This Function adds a new Sales Person to the the salesPeople linked list
        Parameters:
        inSalesPerson - A salesperson object to be added to the salesPeople linked list

      • checkOutKey

        public void checkOutKey(SalesPerson inSalesPerson,
                        Key inKey)
        This function is used to check keys out. The function checks if the key is available then allows the key to be checked out and assigns the salesperson name to the key. If the key is unavailable, an error message is displayed
        Parameters:
        inSalesPerson - The salesperson intending to check out the key
        inKey - the key to be checked out

      • checkInKey

        public void checkInKey(SalesPerson inSalesPerson,
                       Key inKey)
        If the salesperson name matches the name of the person who checked the key out then the key is removed for the checked out list and the salesperson name is removed
        Parameters:
        inSalesPerson - salesperson intending to check in the key
        inKey - key to be checked in

      • searchKey

        public Key searchKey(SalesPerson inSalesPerson,
                     int inKeyId)
        Allows the user to search for a key by ID and returns a key object
        Parameters:
        inSalesPerson - The salesperson performing the search
        inKeyId - the key ID to be searched
        Returns:
        the key object that was found or a dummy object with dummy values if it was not found

      • searchKeyIndex

        public int searchKeyIndex(SalesPerson inSalesPerson,
                          int inKeyId)
        Allows the user to search for a key by ID and returns the index of the key object
        Parameters:
        inSalesPerson - The salesperson performing the search
        inKeyId - the key ID to be searched
        Returns:
        an Int with the index at which the ID was found or -1 if not found

      • getKeyInventorySIZE

        public int getKeyInventorySIZE()
        Returns:
        the size of the linked list storing key objects

      • salesLogIn

        public java.lang.Boolean salesLogIn(java.lang.String inName)
        This function first checks if the user name exists and will prompt the user to re enter user names until the program finds a match. Once there is a match the program asks for a user PIN and will restart the login process if the pin is incorrect. once the credentials are verified then the current user variable is set to the entered and verified credentials
        Parameters:
        inName - the user name a user would like to log on with
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether or not the login was successful

      • searchSalesPeople

        public int searchSalesPeople(java.lang.String searchName)
        Allows a user to search for a salesperson by name and returns the index of the salesperson as an int
        Parameters:
        searchName - The name to be searched for in the salesPeople List
        Returns:
        an integer representing the index of the found salesperson object. or -1 if not found

      • searchSalesPerson

        public SalesPerson searchSalesPerson(java.lang.String searchName)
        Allows a user to search for a salesperson by name and returns a salesperson object
        Parameters:
        searchName - The name to be searched for in the salesPeople List
        Returns:
        the found salesperson object or a dummy object with dummy values

      • userLogin

        public void userLogin()
        Initiates the Login Sequence

      • exitProgram

        public void exitProgram()
        Terminates the program.

      • menuOptions

        public void menuOptions()
        Displays the top menu for the Key Logger Program

      • displayInventory

        public void displayInventory()
        Displays entire key inventory for the user. Gives the option to sort by id or by year.

      • displayCheckedOutKeys

        public void displayCheckedOutKeys()
        Displays the list of all keys currently checked out.

      • logKey

        public void logKey(Key inKey)
        Takes a current timestamp and key information and pushes it into the key log stack
        Parameters:
        inKey - key to be added to the transaction log

      • viewLog

        public void viewLog()
        Prints the transaction log of all the people who have removed keys

      • keyReturn

        public void keyReturn(SalesPerson inSalesPerson)
        This function prints out only the keys that the current salesperson has checked out. The salesperson can then pick which key they would like to return. If the salesperson name matches the name on the key then the key is returned and the salesperson is removed from the key. The key is also removed from the Checked out list.
        Parameters:
        inSalesPerson - the salesperson who wants to return the key

      • sortByID

        public void sortByID()
        This Function Uses Bubble Sort to sort the objects in the linked list by Key ID

      • sortByYear

        public void sortByYear()
        This Function Uses Bubble Sort to sort the objects in the linked list by Year
